data.name: Hire Purchase
data.description: A Commercial Hire Purchase is an agreement for the Bank to purchase an asset at the customer's request.  The Bank gives the customer possession and use of the asset in return for regular repayments.  Once fully repaid ownership in the asset is transferred to the customer.

features.additionalInfo: Minimum finance amount available is $15000 with a term range of 1 year to maximum of 7 years
Flexible repayment terms are available for the product
With Hire Purchase we purchase the asset at your request and you buy it from us in instalments.
With respect to ownership we own the asset until the agreement has been fully paid and ownership automatically transfers to you.
Potential tax benefits : Interest on the finance and depreciation of the asset are generally both tax deductible

eligibility.additionalInfo: Your business must be registered in Australia.
New or existing individual or business customers
Seeking finance for predominately business purposes of the full or partial value of eligible new or used assets

fees.name: Establishment Fee - EF
fees.additionalInfo: Charged to cover the costs of originating your Goods Loan, Hire Purchase or Lease and payable by you on or before the settlement date.

discounts.additionalInfo: Upgrade how you roll with $0 establishment fee (usually $450) on new applications for vehicle and equipment finance. Apply between 1 May ? 30 June 2023 and settle by 14 July 2023.

fees.name: Loan Establishment Fee - EF Private Sale
fees.additionalInfo: Charged to cover the costs of originating your Goods Loan, Hire Purchase or Lease and payable by you on or before the settlement date.

fees.name: Progress Payment Facility - Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged to cover the cost of originating your Progress Payment Facility and payable by you on or before the settlement date

fees.name: Equipment Inspection Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies where we, or one of our agents is required to inspect the Equipment being financed. This fee is payable on or before the settlement date. Note: Sometimes we may require an agent to inspect the goods on our behalf - where this amount differs we will advise you via the Details.

fees.name: Legal Fees for Complex Documentation
fees.additionalInfo: Where we require external Lawyers to document some or all of your contract documentation, we will advise you of this fee before proceeding. It will be payable on or before the settlement date

fees.name: Personal Property Security Fees
fees.additionalInfo: Personal Property Security Fees apply when search and registration fees are applicable. Where charged individually, these will be itemised on your Details and for the current costs, please refer to the PPS Registrar?s website which can be  accessed at below link

fees.name: Aircraft - Register Cape Town Security
fees.additionalInfo: Applies for each registration of Security on the International Register and payable by you on or before the settlement date when this type of security is required for financed aircraft The AUD amount will be quoted to you as part of the settlement documentation where it applies. (I.e. Quote and Details)

fees.name: Aircraft - De-register Cape Town Security
fees.additionalInfo: Applies each time we are required to remove a security registration from the International Register and payable by you on or before the date of removal. The AUD amount will be quoted to you before being charged.

fees.name: Aircraft - CASA Transfer of Ownership
fees.additionalInfo: Applies each time there is/will be a transfer of ownership with the Civil Aviation Safety Authority (CASA) and payable by you on or before the date of transfer.

fees.name: Aircraft - RAA Transfer of Ownership
fees.additionalInfo: Applies each time there is/will be a transfer of ownership with the Recreational Aviation Authority (RAA) and payable by you on or before the date of transfer.

fees.name: Marine - Vessel Registration less than 24 metres
fees.additionalInfo: Applies for each registration of a marine vessel with the Australian Maritime Safety Authority and payable by you on or before the settlement date when this type of security is  required

fees.name: Marine - Vessel Registration greater than 24 metres
fees.additionalInfo: Applies for each registration of a marine vessel with the Australian Maritime Safety Authority and payable by you on or before the settlement date when this type of security is  required

fees.name: Substitution Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applicable for the substitution of Equipment and/or Guarantors and payable by you on or before the date of substitution

fees.name: Early Termination Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applicable when you terminate your Goods Loan, Lease or Hire Purchase early and is charged at an amount equivalent to three monthly payments. We work this out by adding up the total repayments, dividing this by the number of months in the term and multiplying this by 3.

fees.name: Break Costs
fees.additionalInfo: Refer to your Goods Loan, Lease or Hire Purchase Details and the Auto & Equipment Finance General Terms you were provided with for an overview of how this fee is calculated. Break costs are not a fixed amount and are determined by a number of factors specific to your product.

fees.name: Arrears Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applicable each time a payment is not received within 15 days of its due date and is in addition to any overdue amount owing.

fees.name: Overdue interest (Default / Penalty Interest)
fees.additionalInfo: This charge applies on overdue amount from the time it?s due until it?s paid

fees.name: Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies each time a payment you make or amount we attempt to direct debit is unsuccessful.

fees.name: Monthly Account Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies for each month that your agreement (i.e. Lease, Goods Loan or Hire Purchase) remains active and a payment to us is due.

fees.name: Progress Payment Facility - Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each progress payment made on a Progress Payment Facility and is payable by you at the time of each progress payment.
